sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types"> <x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <app display_value="Event Guide">a06fdf36db0b3e00c3beffa31d961993</app> <description><![CDATA[This application leverages many of ServiceNow's core platform capabilities including the workflow engine for internal assignments and approvals, REST APIs to communicate with outside services, Service Portal for a mobile consumer experience, and performance analytics and reporting for insights.]]></description> <gradient_end>#252b2f</gradient_end> <gradient_start>#768490</gradient_start> <heading>The Building Blocks</heading> <order>500</order> <short_description/> <sys_created_by>sush.chandrashekar</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-19 23:31:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d85456fddb088300d6afffb41d961977</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>sush.chandrashekar</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-19 23:33:49</sys_updated_on> <type>Architecture</type> </x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types> </record_update>
